snippet.title: Polar Payne Intro (Max Payne Mod)
snippet.description: Set in the chilling backdrop of the North Pole, you play the role of Dinky, a polar bear who returns to his home to find his family mercilessly slaughtered by Eskimos, high on a new designer drug called Valkyr. Enraged and hungry for bitter revenge, he embarks on a crusade for justice against his family’s murderers.
